frontmatter.title: ChangeLog
frontmatter.meta_title: Mstore Shopify - Complete React Native template for e-commerce
frontmatter.meta_description: MStore Shopify and its massive source of various styles, look & feel navigations, mobile templates, convert your Online shops from Shopify website to mobile apps.

markdownRemark.html:
v1.5.2

1. Update latest Expo v31.0.5
2. Minor bug fix and improver performance

v1.5 

1. Update latest Expo v25.0.0
2. Update JS buy Shopify library to support GraphQL
3. Add installing script: yarn setup
4. Fix UI issues on iPhoneX
5. Refactor code by Shopify Api update
6. Performance improve and minor bug fix

v1.4 

- Update latest Expo v21.0.2
- Update dependencies libraries
- Fix some major bug and speed up performance
- Support IphoneX

v1.1 

- Improve performance 
- Improve the category layout.
- Fix crashing issues.
